Package stores

Class OrderStorage

Object
OrderStorage
public class OrderStorage extends Object
The OrderStorage class implements the Storage interface and provides static methods to manage orders.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String
    orderDataPath
    The path to the serialized order data file.
    private static HashMap<Integer,Order>
    orders
    A HashMap that stores orders.

      The path to the serialized order data file.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderStorage

      public OrderStorage()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static void add(Order order)
      Adds an order to the storage.
      Parameters:
      order - The order object to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the order is null or if an order with the same ID already exists.

    • remove

      public static void remove(Order order)
      Removes an order from the storage.
      Parameters:
      order - The order object to be removed.

    • update

      public static void update(Order order)
      Updates an existing order in the storage.
      Parameters:
      order - The order object to be updated.

    • get

      public static Order get(int orderID)
      Retrieves an order by its ID from the storage.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The order object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getAll

      public static Order[] getAll()
      Retrieves all orders from the storage.
      Returns:
      An array of all order objects in the storage.

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves the orders to the data file.

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads the orders from the data file. If the file does not exist, a new empty storage is created and saved.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears all orders from the storage.
